keywords: ['dance song', 'female voice', 'moderate tempo', 'programmed percussion', 'bass', 'synth backing', 'uptempo', 'club music']
caption: This dance song features a female voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by programmed percussion playing a simple beat which starts off with a drum roll. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. A synth plays chords in the background. This song has an upbeat mood. This song can be played in a club.
